dcterms:creator: David Corney
Dyaa Albakour
Miguel Martinez
Samir Moussa
dcterms:description: A dataset containing approximately 2000 news articles from Reuters, including titles, content, type of publication, source institution, and date and time of publishing, suitable for text mining and NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: Reuters

dcterms:creator: Bennett Kleinberg
van der Vegt Isabelle
Maximilian Mozes
dcterms:description: A ground truth dataset of emotional responses to COVID-19, consisting of 5000 text documents, with 2500 short texts and 2500 long texts, capturing participants' emotions expressed in written form.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 emotions

dcterms:description: A dataset containing information about all audio-video recordings of TED Talks, including views, comments, descriptions, speakers, and transcripts for analysis.
dcterms:title: TED Talks
